introduction.title: Built with thousands of daily measurements
paragraphs: HlCoAi grew inside long term hypertension and metabolic programmes. We know how exhausting paper logs and scattered recommendations can be, so we turn raw numbers into timely nudges and plans

Each morning you receive a snapshot of key metrics and every evening gentle reminders help you stay on track. Beyond pressure and cholesterol we monitor sleep, stress, and nutrition so health management becomes an understandable project

pillars.title: Four pillars of guided care
pillars.subtitle: Monitoring, advice, learning, and family support work together

items.title: Blood pressure journal
items.description: Granular trends, automatic thresholds, and reminders reveal patterns instead of isolated spikes
items.body: We aggregate data from devices and manual notes, flag risky combinations, and suggest daily routine adjustments
bullets: Smart prompts about position and timing
Alerts when heart rate rises abruptly

items.title: Nutrition coach with photos
items.description: Snap a meal to understand calories and receive actionable swaps to balance the plate
items.body: Computer vision estimates nutrients while dietitians provide approachable comments without strict restrictions
bullets: Up to ninety two percent accuracy on common dishes

items.title: AI assistant plus human experts
items.description: Ask about medication, symptoms, or workouts; AI responds instantly and escalates to a coach when a human voice is needed
items.body: We do not replace clinicians but prepare you for the visit with structured history and clarifying questions
bullets: Twenty four seven answers in plain language

items.title: Transparent subscription
items.description: One plan covers consultations, analytics, and reporting with no hidden fees
items.body: You know where the resources go: data science, medical experts, and proactive outreach whenever you need it

bullets: Plans you can share with family

stories.title: Member voices
stories.subtitle: Families and clinicians describe how HlCoAi fits their routine

items.name: Olga, 54
items.quote: "Night time spikes felt scary. Now I have a plan and a team that explains every change"
items.text: After her husband’s stroke Olga worried she was missing her own symptoms. HlCoAi revealed how stress and meals affected her pressure and suggested gradual adjustments

items.name: Igor, 38
items.quote: "Training is only half the story; recovery matters just as much. The platform gives me that insight"
items.text: Coaching teenagers meant Igor often overtrained. The system highlighted when his heart rate stayed elevated and guided him to balance load and rest

items.name: Dr. Alla
items.quote: "A digital log disciplines patients and saves time at the appointment—we discuss actions instead of guessing timelines"
items.text: Clinicians need reliable data while patients need reassurance. HlCoAi builds that bridge so I can step in early without overwhelming people with messages

support.title: Support when it matters

Help is available via messenger, phone, and live sessions. You always know who to reach and which steps to take

Start by signing in and sharing your goals; we will help turn heart care into a sustainable habit
